detailed_description: A minimal Attendance Management System using REST APIs. The system supports students and teachers with role-based access control. Architecture is RESTful API with JSON. Authentication uses token-based JWT. Roles are STUDENT and TEACHER. Features include secure password hashing, proper HTTP status codes, input validation and error handling, and role-based authorization on all endpoints.
features: Authentication - Login users and issue access tokens via POST /auth/login
Authentication - Register new users with role assignment via POST /auth/register
Student Dashboard - View daily and historical attendance via GET /student/attendance/summary and GET /student/attendance/history
Attendance Marking - Students can mark attendance once per day via POST /student/attendance/mark with duplicate prevention
Teacher Dashboard - View attendance overview and filter by date or student via GET /teacher/dashboard and GET /teacher/attendance
Attendance Record Management - Teachers can view and update attendance records via PUT /teacher/attendance/{attendanceId}
Profile Management - Fetch and update user profile details via GET /user/profile and PUT /user/profile
Authorization middleware on all protected routes

endpoints.description: Login users and issue access tokens
Register new users with role assignment
Filter attendance by date or student

non_functional_requirements: Authorization middleware on all protected routes
